title: Pharmacy POS
description: An Advanced, Powerful and Flexible POS Software with Complete Accounts Solution for Pharmacy
features: Manage Multiple Branch in a Single System
Instant Branch to Branch Stock Transfer
Real Time Dashboard (Daily Sales, Weekly Sales, Monthly Sales)
POS Sales (Both Cash Sale and Credit Sale)
Create and Manage Suppliers and Customers Accounts
Automatically Create Customer and Supplier Ledger’s to Track Their Receivables and Payables
Track and Create Daily, Monthly Expenses
Complete Stock Management (In Stock & Out of Stock)
Integrated Complete Accounting Solution (General Ledger, Trial Balance, Balance Sheet, Income Statement)
Create Multi User and Assign Multiple Unique Roles to Each User

keyFeaturesDetails.title: Sales
keyFeaturesDetails.body: Diamond’s Planning helps institutions establish and execute a sustainable Strategic Planning process that mirrors your institutional complexity and unique mission. With built-in tools for documenting improvement plans, making resource requests, viewing activities, and managing workflows, Diamond’s Planning brings your strategic plan to life while reducing your administrative burden.

keyFeaturesDetails.title: Purchase
keyFeaturesDetails.body: Diamond’s Budget streamlines the financial planning process. Empower your budget planners with easy-to-use tools that integrate operational budget planning with resource requests tied directly to strategic planning initiatives. Track all resource requests account by account and give decision makers an environment to deliberate and allocate funds.

keyFeaturesDetails.title: Inventory
keyFeaturesDetails.body: Diamond’s Assessment creates an intuitive framework supporting ongoing assessment, including Program Review, that is visible, accountable, and anchored in data with actionable insights at all levels. Your team is better positioned to fulfill your institution’s mission and achieve transformational outcomes with SPOL Diamond.

keyFeaturesDetails.title: Accounts
keyFeaturesDetails.body: Diamond’s Credentialing creates a centralized document repository that facilitates faculty credential collection, verification, and management across multiple colleges, departments, and programs using customizable Workflow that mirrors your approval processes and reduces administrative burden to streamline faculty credential management and accreditation.

keyFeaturesDetails.title: MIS
keyFeaturesDetails.body: Diamond’s Accreditation helps your institution consistently exceed regional and programmatic accreditation expectations with our fully customizable SPOL Diamond platform to reflect your institution’s unique mission. Diamond helps free up the clerical and administrative burden of organizing data and focus on the quality submission to your accrediting body!
